briefdescription.para: This class is a child of the Communicate class, and has more specialized methods.

para.bold: Details< / b> The Communicate has the same parameters as it's parent class. This class is far more involved with databases however, and can see, retreive, insert, and update all sorts of fields within our TMS database.

para.emphasis: Ashley Ingle + Andrew Tudor + Will Schwetz + Taylor Trainor
